text: aur jis jagah se aap nikle apna mu masjid haraam ki taraf pherle aur jaha kahi tum ho apne chehre osi taraf kiya karo, ta ke logo ki koi hujjath23 tum par baaqi na reh jaaye, sivaaye un logo ke jinhone un mein se zulm kiya hai, tum un se na daro, mujh hee se daro aur ta ke main apni nemath tum par puri karo aur is liye bhi ke tum raahe rasth pao
